tasks.title: Set up Obsidian vault structure for Life-OS
tasks.description: Create the foundational directory structure for the ADHD Operating System based on the Life-OS template, including all required folders and initial configuration files
tasks.details: Implement the complete Life-OS directory structure including: Life-OS (Inbox, Daily, Tasks, Dashboard, Habits, Finance, Config), Claude integration, Work management, Knowledge base, Personal sections, System infrastructure, and Attachments. Each directory should have appropriate emoji prefixes for visual organization.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all directories are created with correct structure and permissions. Test that Obsidian can open the vault without errors.

tasks.title: Implement core daily note system
tasks.description: Create the daily note template system with ADHD-optimized features including time blocking, energy tracking, and task management
tasks.details: Build daily note templates that include: morning brain dump section, time blocks with visual indicators, energy level tracking, task list with quick capture, accomplishment celebration section, and evening reflection. Templates should auto-populate with incomplete tasks from previous day.
tasks.testStrategy: Create sample daily notes for a week and verify template functionality, auto-population of tasks, and time tracking features work correctly.

tasks.title: Build intelligent task management system
tasks.description: Develop the ADHD-specific task management system with automatic breakdown, time estimation, and priority management
tasks.details: Create task templates with fields for: estimated time (with ADHD buffer), actual time tracking, energy level required, complexity score, dependencies, and subtask breakdown. Implement automatic task chunking for tasks over 2 hours. Add visual priority indicators and quick-win identification.
tasks.testStrategy: Test task creation, automatic breakdown of complex tasks, time tracking accuracy, and priority sorting algorithms.

tasks.title: Create inbox quick capture system
tasks.description: Implement a frictionless inbox system for capturing thoughts, tasks, and ideas without context switching
tasks.details: Build inbox templates with minimal required fields, automatic timestamping, and intelligent categorization. Include voice-to-text support, image capture, and quick sorting mechanisms. Implement daily inbox processing workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Test capture speed (must be under 5 seconds), categorization accuracy, and daily processing workflow efficiency.

tasks.title: Develop focus enhancement tools
tasks.description: Build the Pomodoro timer system with ADHD adaptations and distraction blocking features
tasks.details: Create customizable Pomodoro timer with ADHD-friendly intervals (starting at 15 minutes), break reminders with movement suggestions, hyperfocus alerts after extended sessions, and integration with task tracking. Include distraction log for capturing wandering thoughts.
tasks.testStrategy: Run focus sessions of various lengths, test break reminders, hyperfocus detection, and distraction capture functionality.

tasks.title: Implement memory augmentation features
tasks.description: Create the external memory system with session documentation and context preservation
tasks.details: Build session checkpoint system that captures: current task context, decisions made, next steps, and mental state. Implement smart search across all notes, visual knowledge graphs, and automatic linking of related content.
tasks.testStrategy: Test checkpoint creation and restoration, search accuracy across large note sets, and knowledge graph visualization.

tasks.title: Build time awareness visualizations
tasks.description: Create visual time management tools to combat time blindness
tasks.details: Implement visual time blocks with color coding, elapsed time indicators on all activities, time estimation vs actual tracking, and progressive deadline alerts. Include calendar integration with buffer time calculations.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify time visualization accuracy, test deadline alerts at various intervals, and validate calendar sync functionality.

tasks.title: Create habit tracking system
tasks.description: Develop visual habit tracking with streak management and reward mechanisms
tasks.details: Build habit templates with visual progress indicators, streak tracking, flexible scheduling (daily/weekly/custom), and celebration animations. Include habit stacking suggestions and energy-based scheduling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test habit creation, streak calculation, missed day handling, and reward trigger mechanisms.

tasks.title: Implement dashboard analytics
tasks.description: Create comprehensive dashboards for daily, weekly, and monthly progress tracking
tasks.details: Build dashboards showing: task completion rates, time estimation accuracy, energy patterns, focus session statistics, habit streaks, and productivity trends. Include motivational metrics and achievement celebrations.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify data aggregation accuracy, test real-time updates, and validate trend calculations over multiple time periods.

tasks.title: Develop AI integration layer
tasks.description: Integrate Claude AI for intelligent task breakdown, prioritization, and assistance
tasks.details: Implement Claude API integration for: automatic task breakdown, intelligent prioritization based on energy and dependencies, session summary generation, and adaptive reminder scheduling. Include natural language task input processing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API connectivity, task breakdown quality, prioritization logic, and natural language understanding accuracy.

tasks.title: Create motivation and reward system
tasks.description: Build gamification elements and achievement tracking for dopamine regulation
tasks.details: Implement achievement system with unlockable rewards, task completion animations, streak celebrations, and progress milestones. Include customizable reward preferences and optional social sharing features.
tasks.testStrategy: Test achievement triggers, reward unlocking logic, animation performance, and user engagement metrics.

tasks.title: Build overwhelm prevention features
tasks.description: Create intelligent filtering and progressive disclosure systems to prevent cognitive overload
tasks.details: Implement 'today only' view, automatic task deferral when overloaded, complexity hiding with progressive disclosure, and emergency brain dump mode. Include breathing exercise prompts during high-stress detection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test cognitive load detection, task filtering algorithms, and stress intervention trigger accuracy.

tasks.title: Develop Obsidian plugin architecture
tasks.description: Create the core Obsidian plugin framework for all ADHD-OS features
tasks.details: Build modular plugin architecture supporting: hot-reload for development, settings management, command palette integration, and inter-plugin communication. Ensure compatibility with popular Obsidian plugins.
tasks.testStrategy: Test plugin loading, settings persistence, command registration, and compatibility with top 10 Obsidian plugins.

tasks.title: Implement mobile PWA companion
tasks.description: Create progressive web app for mobile quick capture and task management
tasks.details: Build PWA with offline support, quick capture interface, task viewing/updating, and timer functions. Include push notifications for reminders and sync with desktop vault.
tasks.testStrategy: Test offline functionality, sync reliability, notification delivery, and cross-device data consistency.

tasks.title: Create financial management module
tasks.description: Build ADHD-friendly financial tracking with impulsivity safeguards
tasks.details: Implement expense tracking with receipt photos, budget visualizations, impulsive purchase cooling-off period, and subscription management. Include financial goal gamification.
tasks.testStrategy: Test transaction entry speed, budget calculation accuracy, and impulsivity intervention effectiveness.

tasks.title: Build knowledge graph visualization
tasks.description: Create interactive knowledge graph for discovering connections between notes
tasks.details: Implement force-directed graph visualization of note connections, cluster identification for related topics, and interactive exploration. Include search highlighting and connection strength indicators.
tasks.testStrategy: Test graph rendering performance with 1000+ notes, interaction responsiveness, and cluster detection accuracy.

tasks.title: Develop template management system
tasks.description: Create comprehensive template system for all Life-OS components
tasks.details: Build template library including: daily/weekly/monthly reviews, project planning, meeting notes, and quick capture forms. Include template customization UI and sharing capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test template creation, variable substitution, and cross-platform compatibility.

tasks.title: Implement voice integration
tasks.description: Add voice input capabilities for hands-free capture and command execution
tasks.details: Integrate speech-to-text for quick capture, voice commands for common actions, and audio note transcription. Support multiple languages and accents.
tasks.testStrategy: Test recognition accuracy in various noise conditions, command execution reliability, and transcription quality.

tasks.title: Create onboarding experience
tasks.description: Build progressive onboarding system for new ADHD-OS users
tasks.details: Implement interactive tutorial covering core features, personalization wizard for ADHD preferences, and progressive feature unlocking. Include video guides and example vault.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with new users, measure feature adoption rates, and validate tutorial completion rates.

tasks.title: Build sync and backup system
tasks.description: Create secure synchronization and backup infrastructure
tasks.details: Implement end-to-end encrypted sync, automatic versioning with rollback, and multi-device conflict resolution. Include local and cloud backup options.
tasks.testStrategy: Test sync speed, encryption integrity, conflict resolution accuracy, and backup restoration reliability.
